data.eml:eml: First record of the hermit crab genus Cestopagurus Bouvier, 1897 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguridae) from the South Pacific Ocean and description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Tsuchida, Shinji, Clark, Malcolm R. (2014): First record of the hermit crab genus Cestopagurus Bouvier, 1897 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguridae) from the South Pacific Ocean and description of a new species. Zootaxa 3860 (6): 580-588, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3860.6.6
